Package view_controller

package view_controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GameOverPane
    The GameOverPane class represents the pane displayed when a game is over.
    LeaderboardEntry
    The LeaderboardEntry class represents an entry in a leaderboard.
    LeaderboardManager
    The LeaderboardManager class provides static methods to save and load leaderboard data.
    MainMenuPane
    The MainMenuPane class represents a custom JavaFX GridPane used as the main menu for a game.
    PauseMenuPane
    Sets up the GUI, including layout, animations, and style, for the pause menu in the game.
    PlayerSelectionPane
    The PlayerSelectionPane class represents a custom JavaFX GridPane used for player selection in a game menu.
    SpaceInvadersGUI
    Main GUI for the Space Invaders Game that contains all the different panes
    TutorialPane
    The TutorialPane class represents a custom JavaFX BorderPane used for displaying a tutorial with multiple pages.
    UpgradeShipPane
    Constructs the window that appears after each round where the player has the option to choose a different space ship
